section.heading: Prosecutions.
section.text: All prosecutions for violations of the provisions of §§ 47-2301 to 47-2315 or regulations prescribed thereunder may be in the Superior Court of the District of Columbia, upon information filed by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia or any of his assistants; and all suits for the collection of any tax or penalty under §§ 47-2301 to 47-2315 or such regulations shall be instituted by the Attorney General for the District of Columbia or any of his assistants.

annoGroup.heading: Effect of Amendments
annoGroup.annotation: D.C. Law 15-354 substituted “Attorney General for the District of Columbia” for “Corporation Counsel”.
